programme.title: The X Factor UK S14 - EP 2
programme.desc: The X Factor UK is a British television music competition to find new singing talent. Returning series.

programme.title: Whacked Out Sports - EP 25
programme.desc: This series features sports mishaps, crashes and bloopers from all around the world.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 641
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune 36 - EP 7009
programme.desc: (Encore) Wheel Of Fortune is an American television game show created by Merv Griffin. The show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune 36 - EP 7010
programme.desc: (Encore) Wheel Of Fortune is an American television game show created by Merv Griffin. The show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 22
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Jonas Brothers and Kieran Culkin. Jonas Brothers perform "Only Human" from their CD, "Happiness Begins".

programme.title: All Over The Workplace - EP 4
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. In each episode, two children get to do just that, meeting various celebrities and well-known role models along the way. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.title: Welcome To The Wayne S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: Ansi Molina moves into the Wayne, an apartment building filled with strange and unusual things labeled as "Wayne Phenomena". He befriends siblings Olly and Saraline Timbers as they learn the mysteries of the Wayne and protect the outside world while contending with a spy cell seeking to exploit apartment's supernatural aspects for their own nefarious ends.

programme.title: Coconut The Little Dragon S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Fire Dragon Coconut, Gourmet Dragon Oscar and porcupine Matilda are always up for adventure! Life is not always easy on Dragon Island - Coconut has flying problems, Oscar is the only vegetarian in his family and Matilda has no say as a porcupine on Dragon Island anyway. Nevertheless the little ones prove that sometimes the smallest can be the biggest!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5 - EP 9
programme.desc: Get ready for a tail-wagging good time in these rescue adventures with the PAW Patrol! No job is too big, no pup is too small as Ryder and the pups are always ready to lend a paw.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3 - EP 16
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and maths.

programme.title: Sarah & Duck S3 - EP 17
programme.desc: Sarah and her loud, quacky friend Duck are back for a whole new series of fun and heartfelt adventures as they explore the world around them in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Backyardigans - EP 62
programme.desc: The show's 5 high-spirited preschool friends - Pablo, Uniqua, Tasha, Tyrone and Austin rely on their vivid imaginations to transform their backyard into a fantastical adventure and together they embark on amazing journeys.

programme.title: Coconut The Little Dragon S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Fire Dragon Coconut, Gourmet Dragon Oscar and porcupine Matilda are always up for adventure! Life is not always easy on Dragon Island - Coconut has flying problems, Oscar is the only vegetarian in his family and Matilda has no say as a porcupine on Dragon Island anyway. Nevertheless the little ones prove that sometimes the smallest can be the biggest!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S4 - EP 9
programme.desc: The children go for an adventure through the Jungle. But some of them aren't able to do certain things as well as the others. Will they give up and get left behind? Chalky receives a cactus, but the children feel that the cactus would be better off back home with its real family. The children go on an adventure in search of the cactus's real home and family.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5 - EP 9
programme.desc: Get ready for a tail-wagging good time in these rescue adventures with the PAW Patrol! No job is too big, no pup is too small as Ryder and the pups are always ready to lend a paw.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3 - EP 16
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and maths.

programme.title: Shimmer And Shine S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twin genies, Shimmer and Shine unintentionally create chaos in their attempts to grant wishes for their human best friend, Leah.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 1
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Justine's Flavors Of Fuji - EP 1
programme.desc: In an area filled with an extraordinary amount of tradition and culture, Justine meets local artisans and producers, visits amazing places and learns time-honoured cooking methods. Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 641
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: 亲 Kin - EP 371
programme.desc: Convinced that Yang is manipulating Dr Shen into breaking up with her, Ah Yoke issues a counter-statement to dispute the decision to call of the engagement. Adina confronts Rosnani for her role in encouraging Zara to divorce Razali.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Hosts Kevin Pereira and Brooke Van Poppelen explore and demonstrate the world of hacks, short cuts and cheats, that can be time and money-saving .

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 - EP 9
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In THE CARBONARO EFFECT, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera. Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace - EP 4
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. In each episode, two children get to do just that, meeting various celebrities and well-known role models along the way. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 - EP 3
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of this enthusiastic, optimistic sponge whose good intentions inevitably lead him and his friends into trouble.

programme.title: Pokemon The Series: Sun And Moon S21 - EP 46
programme.desc: In the new season of Pokemon, a mysterious Pokemon, Nebby, suddenly appears before Ash. With Nebby causing all kinds of trouble, will the Pokemon school experience be even more chaotic than usual!? What's more, Legendary Pokemon Solgaleo and Lunala will make an appearance this season. Look forward to the further adventures of Ash and Pikachu!

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 16
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

(重)《笑傲江湖》是改编自武侠巨作金庸的原著，由霍志揩执导，马景涛、范文芳等主演的古装电视剧。该剧讲述了华山弟子令狐冲（马景涛饰）为了替师父寻找秘籍《葵花宝典》，而从此卷入江湖争斗。.

programme.desc: (R) Based on Louis Cha's classic swordplay novel, this lavish production stars Taiwanese heartthrob Ma Jing Tao as a legendary swordsman and TCS top actress Fann Wong as his love interest. The story centres around a pugilistic manual known as the Sunflower Scripture. Its sudden disappearance leads to bloodshed and death-defying encounters for swordsman Ling Hu Chong. (重)《笑傲江湖》是改编自武侠巨作金庸的原著，由霍志揩执导，马景涛、范文芳等主演的古装电视剧。该剧讲述了华山弟子令狐冲（马景涛饰）为了替师父寻找秘籍《葵花宝典》，而从此卷入江湖争斗。.

programme.title: 100年前，新加坡 Singapore On Film - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Singapore in the early 1900s, the height of colonial rule. We see coolies sharing lunch, mourners at a grand funeral and Europeans having tea - brought vividly to life in these rare archival films. (重)100年前的新加坡，我们在照片上看过，不过，会动的画面可算是十分罕见的。过去几十年，它们一直被保存在英国电影协会的气候控制库内。经过清理、数码化和修复，这些影片顿时恢复了生命力，为首次面对控制库外的观众做好准备。.

Wen Yu is secretly happy since it may mean that Dong Sheng and Lin Li will split. However, Dong Sheng does not want to go overseas. Wen Yu tells Lin Li about the situation, hoping that she will not hinder his future. After some consideration, Lin Li initiates a breakup with Dong Sheng ....... (PG)(重)(大结局)有经纪公司要和东升签约，并送他到国外受训。文豫暗喜，这样一来东升和林俐就会分开。但东升表示不想出国，文豫把事情告诉林俐，希望林俐不要阻碍东升的前程。林俐思忖后，向东升提出分手……。.

(PG)(重)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.

programme.title: 焦点 Focus - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Focus provides timely reports and analyses on international news and current affairs from Singapore's perspective. (重)《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 我的小小美猴王 My Little Monkey King - EP 33
programme.desc: (R) Little Monkey King wants to become the Great Monkey King, so he went out to acquire skills. On the way, in order to avoid the puppy, he transformed himself into a doll. Dabaos father bought him home, to live with their family. (重)小小美猴王要成为真正的美猴王 ,还需要学习许许多多的本领，于是他外出学艺。在途中为了躲避小狗，他变成一个布娃娃，被大宝爸爸买回家，与他们全家人生活在一起。.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Youting meets with some issues with his supplement business and might get sued. He does not want to go to jail and asks for the wishing coin from Shanmei to wish him out of his troubles. Shanmei and Yaozong do not want Youting to shirk from his responsibilities and tells him honestly that even if the wishing coin was around, they will not give him. Youting is dejected and Yaozu encourages him to escape from the country. Before Youting leaves, Xiaomin passes a wishing coin to him. (PG)(重)佑庭代理的保健品出了问题，可能被控。他不想坐牢，向善美讨取钱币，要许愿脱离困境。善美和耀宗不希望佑庭逃避责任，坦言就算钱币没有不见，也不会给他。佑庭痛心失望，耀祖怂恿他出国避难。佑庭临走前，晓敏把一枚钱币交给他。.

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Qingchen activates the Linglong formation. When she found out about the Sorceresses' rebellion and them being sold as slaves, she realizes that she has actually returned to a year ago. Qingchen is a stranger to the Sorceresses. (PG)(重)卿尘开启九转玲珑，打听到巫族叛乱被贬为奴才发现自己竟然回到了一年前。对巫族来讲卿尘只是一个陌生人。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 362
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) After a day at work, Shu Juan and Xiao Long see the lift is under maintenance again. Shu Juan is full of resentment. Xiao Long wants Shu Juan to think twice about participating in the En Bloc project, and not miss the rare opportunity. He Fan is disappointed with Wei Ren when he realizes that Wei Ren is the mastermind behind the En Bloc project. He expresses that he will not move out of Mei Hao Yuan. (PG)(重)淑娟和小龙收摊回家，发现电梯又在维修，淑娟满腹怨气。小龙要她考虑集体出售的事，免得错失良机，淑娟斩钉截铁说自己绝对不会答应。贺凡得知公寓正在酝酿集体出售的事，发起人正是为人，感到痛心，表示自己不会搬走。.

programme.title: Hello Singapore - EP 4
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 7
programme.desc: (Part 2) Zhongxue suddenly passes out in the car. Fortunately, Zoe and Kennis happen to pass by and go to his rescue. Zhongxue does not want his illness to be known and asks them to keep it secret. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(第7集下)仲学无故在车上晕倒，幸得路过的苏怡和洛雯急救。仲学刻意隐瞒病情, 并要她们替他保密。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 James' Going Places - EP 1
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. (首播)身为新竹人的詹姆士，带着大家去寻找记忆中最难忘的家乡味：金钱虾饼。而在寻找金钱虾饼的过程中，遇到了各类在地食材专家，带领大家一窥个中奥秘，告诉观众百分百纯米制造的米粉如何挑选？柿饼从涩变甜的秘诀是什么？.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 1
programme.desc: Mandy is a rich housewife who goes around flaunting her wealth to other rich housewives. Her husband, Xie Zhi Hong, who is a lawyer, unexpectedly goes bankrupt and intends to run away with his mistress after selling all his properties. Mandy went to the airport to reason with Zhi Hong, hoping to move him, in hopes that he will change his mind but he suddenly falls to the ground! (PG)(首播)Mandy是个养尊处优的富太太，生活重心便是游走于上流社会的富太太之间，彼此炫富。不料律师丈夫谢志鸿破产，变卖物业后准备和小三远走高飞。Mandy追到机场与志鸿理论，动之以情，想让他回心转意，志鸿却突然倒地不起！.

programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 罪案心理小组X Visible Lies - EP 13
programme.desc: Tang Sen brings the team to the Tang Village for sight-seeing. Shortly after they arrive at the village, the team meets with a hostage case. Subsequently, Tang Sen's long-time contact, Tang Tianli, is found dead in a hotel bathtub. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)趁大伙放假，唐森招待大家到唐家村走走看看。唐森一行人到达唐家村不久后就碰上一宗挟持案，一直很照顾唐森的天里叔也离奇在浴缸里溺毙。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Tianjiu is eager to acquire the land where Wen Ying's mother- in- law once lived . Mrs Gao approaches Wen Ying about selling their unit but the latter refuses. Feeling vexed, she orders Guo Bao to use unscrupulous means to get them out. (PG13-毒品相关内容)(重)天鹫很想收购淑娥旧居的地，美华向与文英砌商但文英不买人情，拒绝让步，美华激怒之下，派国宝带人威吓他们。.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 42
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 超凡魔术师 The Amazing Magicians - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) "The Amazing Magicians" is a China variety show in which the show contestants are chosen through "pick a million" competition system.The program includes the best behind-the-scenes players from Hollywood and the world of Magicians. (重)《超凡魔术师》是出自中国的综艺节目。节目采取了“万里挑一"的赛制。此外节目还邀请到了好莱坞和魔术届最强的幕后班底。.

programme.desc: Weekday afternoon updates on local and world news headlines. 《一点新闻》为您提供更新的本地与全球新闻头条。.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 102
programme.desc: (R) A customer flies into a rage after being served spoilt dumplings. Shun Shui insists otherwise and refunds him the money. He then pushes to blame to Shun Feng, claiming that he turned off the power to the refrigerator. (PG)(重)顾客吃到变质粽子，大发脾气，顺水试了后却说粽子根本没发酸，退钱打发顾客。达明戳穿顺水在说谎，粽子确实已经变质。顺水把责任推给顺风，说是顺风关掉蒸箱的电源所导致。达明见他非但不觉得自己有错，还推卸责任，不禁勃然大怒。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Tiong Bahru, is not only one of the oldest housing estates in Singapore, but also a district with many hidden secrets!Have you wondered where lies Tan Tock Seng or the air bomb shelter from World War II? Do you know how do Singapore's first HDB flats built during colonial era look like? Come along with our hosts to uncover Tiong Bahru! (重)中峇鲁是新加坡最古老的住宅区，也有很多潮流咖啡厅，但还有很多鲜为人知的事！想看陈笃生墓园，或是二战遗留的防空壕？你知道新加坡从殖民地时代就建造的第一代祖屋是什么样子的吗？那就随着主持人一起去探索中峇鲁吧.

programme.title: 健康那些事 全民来防疫 Get Fit With Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial. (重)运动 (Exercise) 即使需要减少群体活动，自己一人同样能运动！运动达人们传授各种适合乐龄人士的运动，教大家不断 keep fit 强身健体。.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Xiaomin steals a wishing coin for Youting, Yaozu rushes over to try to steal the coin from him. During the process, Ah Gong and Xiaomin are knocked unconscious by Yaozu and Youting manages to take the coin away in the midst of the chaos. Youting wanders outside but finally returns home to beg for forgiveness as he feels guilty. Youting is brought away to the police station. (PG)(重))晓敏偷拿愿望钱币给佑庭，耀祖赶至，欲抢夺钱币。过程中阿公和晓敏被耀祖打晕，佑庭在混乱中将愿望钱币带走。佑庭在外躲藏，内心愧疚，悔不当初，最后终于回家求家人原谅。警察来到，以佑庭涉嫌伤害阿公的罪名，将他带回警局。.

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Yuanling is ambushed by Liang's army, but fortunately, the Sorceress, Biyao, comes to his rescue. After the Sorceresses learnt of the death of the youngest Sorceress, Meiya, they are even more suspicious of Qingchen. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)元凌遭梁兵突袭幸好巫女碧瑶率众支援方才化险为夷。巫女们知晓美牙离世后十分惊讶，对卿尘更是多了几分忌惮。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 363
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Xi Yue is planning an exhibition. Yan Xun sends Xi Yue flowers to congratulate her and promise that he will reach before the opening ceremony. However, Jia Ying meets an unreasonable client at the presentation which causes the contractor to leave in a fit of anger. Jia Ying has no choice but calls Yan Xun for help. Yan Xun solves the problem without a hassle, which makes Jia Ying changes her impression of him. (PG)(重)喜悦策划文物展，彦勋送花道贺，承诺会赶在开幕礼之前出现。但因嘉颖在发表会上遇到麻烦客户提出无理要求，气走电流承包商，无计可施下只好向彦勋求救。彦勋用计谋使得事情圆满解决，漂亮手法令嘉颖对他印象改观。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 5
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 8
programme.desc: (Part 1) Zhongxue suffers from lung cancer and seeks Tang Ming's opinion in private. Tang Ming urges him to undergo operation as soon as possible. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(第8集上) 仲学患有肺癌，私下询问唐明意见。唐明劝他早日开刀。.

programme.title: 小偏方大拆解 Health Hacks - EP 8
programme.desc: Ear, nose & throat (ENT) are three linked organs. When one organ gets infected, the other two will also be affected. Nose allergies, Meniere's disease, throat inflammation & snoring are common ENT problems. Let's check out the effectiveness of various folk remedies that said to treat ENT problems. 耳、鼻、喉三个器官相连，当中某一器官一旦病变，会造成各器官之间的相互影响。鼻子过敏、耳水不平衡、喉咙发炎、睡觉打鼾等问题经常困扰着人们，治疗耳鼻喉问题的偏方也不少，这些偏方是否有用呢？.

programme.title: 星期二特写-- 极限人生 Tuesday Report - No Limit - EP 4
programme.desc: They challenge the limits of the human body by jumping further. Some raise the threshold for pain with each body slam. And some push themselves further and faster on wheels and in skates, for glory and honour. They are the parkour athletes, the professional wrestlers, the Go Kart racers and the ice hockey players - pursuing a passion with no limits. 跑酷健将飞檐走壁，挑战体能极限？摔角手在台上较劲是力量的挑战？卡丁车在赛道上飞驰、冰棍球员在溜冰场上比拼，是一场场极速的征战？全新系列《极限人生》带大家走进不畏劣势的运动员世界，看他们如何让冷门激发热情，挑战自我极限。.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 2
programme.desc: Zhi Hong died due to a heart attack. Mandy held a grand funeral for him, thinking that Zhi Hong will leave her a sum of money. However, she finds out from his lawyer that he was bankrupt long ago and withdrew all his savings, only leaving a few hundred dollars in their joint account. With only a hundred thousand dollars left in her own account and an invalid credit card, Mandy feels lost. (PG)志鸿心脏病发身亡，Mandy以为他虽然变卖了家产，一定还留下大笔遗产，便为他办了风光葬礼，谁知过后才从律师口中得知志鸿早就破产，还把银行存款都提出，联名户头中只剩几百元，信用卡也不能再用，Mandy只剩下自己户头中的十几万，有些茫然。.

programme.title: 健康密码 第二季 Health Code S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Hosted by Boey Leung & doctor writer Ouyang Lin, this brand new season sees medical specialists talking about illnesses that affect your daily life. 知名医生作家欧阳林搭档梁宝仪主持的全新医疗保健节目，邀请专科医生解开疾病迷思，同时有营养师分享正确饮食观，让你轻松在生活中掌握健康密码。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 20

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 43
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 爱玩客之移动厨房 2019 IWalker - Moving Kitchen 2019 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Follow Li Yi and Yan Yong Lie as they embark on a tour round Taiwan whipping up yummy cuisines and hearty desserts. (重)延续上集李易永烈在第一阶段试菜后，将再继续品尝各式料理培养灵感。包括各种海鲜汇集的海天锅；分为四种辣度，辣到全身爆汗的辣排骨锅；前进最热闹的弘大商圈，品尝道地起司热狗、韩式鸡蛋糕、鱼糕串。最后制作两道泡菜创意料理，好好慰劳一下辛苦醃制泡菜的韩国阿珠嬷。.

Shu Juan does not want to wait for things to happen. She decides to form an opposition team to protest against the proposition team. programme.title: 边缘青年 Forgotten Youths - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) There are 2 million abandoned youths in the Philippines. Some are trapped by the vicious cycle of poverty; others are victims of abuse and neglect by their parents. Meant as a solution to these social problems - Duterte's war on drugs - has instead created a new generation of drug war orphans. (重)在菲律宾有两百万名孩子被遗弃。其中25万名青少年露宿街头，有些甚至以坟场为家。而有些是在2016年开始的扫毒战争中被遗忘的孤儿们。种种的社会问题造成了恶性循环。这些无依无靠的孤儿们要何去何从？.

programme.title: 已读不回 Blue Tick - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Nianxia sent Li Kaixin a message with Fangxing's phone, frightening her into running out of the hotel and getting caught by the police. Li Kaixin was sentenced. Nianxia visited her in jail, hoping to help her. Sidong and Nianxia happily went on a date but saw Song Haoran. Meanwhile two assassins were getting ready to ambush them. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)念夏利用方行的电话发讯息给李凯欣，吓得李凯欣逃出宾馆，在街上被警察抓。 李凯欣被判刑，念夏前往探望，希望代方行帮助李凯欣重回正轨。思冬用心安排约会，念夏开心赴会，却看见宋皓然出现！而在另一个暗角里，还有两个杀手匿伏着。.

programme.title: 非常监狱 Extraordinary Prisons - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In Bollate Prison, inmates do not wear uniform, and are allowed to move around in the prison compound. Those who work in the restaurant, which opens to public, can even experience close encounter with their guests. Follow Huang Jing Lun as he visits this extraordinary prison in Milan where he even gets to participate a unique inmate horse training program. (重)意大利米兰有一座监狱，囚犯不但不穿囚衣，白天还能在监狱内自由走动。因为他们也是“上班一族”，在对外的餐厅工作，还有机会接触来自自由世界的顾客。主持人黄靖伦在波拉特监狱大开眼界，还亲身体验监狱中的养马课程如何对囚犯潜移默化。监狱种种大胆的措施，是为了让囚犯重返社会做好准备。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 24
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Na-yan knows Taijun does not really care for Xinxing and thus does not agree to passing over Xinxing's custody to him. Jinfeng leaves Xinxing alone at home while she goes to meet Shiguang. Manting grabs the chance to bring Xinxing away. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜妍知道泰俊不是真心要抚养新星的，于是不答应把新星交给他。金凤去跟世光约会，把新星一个人留在家里。满婷乘机把新星带到幼京家去。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 17

After the wedding cancellation was exposed, Daojing felt very sorry for Haiying. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)知道道京更喜欢漂亮的海英之后，海英在她们公司聚会，殴打漂亮的海英。毁了婚礼的事件暴露，道京对海英感到更内疚。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 33
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Shina manages to trick Yingyu into using Zhenghan's name stamp to withdraw money from the account managed by both YB and Jiezi Cosmetics. Zhenghan is arrested for embezzlement. Xiangmin agrees to give up his land to save Zhenghan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)崔德培成功说服英玉担任他公司的登记理事。英玉一盖章，崔德培就卷款潜逃，导致英玉成为债主们讨债的对象。接下来，世娜成功引导英玉用正韩的印鉴在文件上盖章，导致正韩被YB检举挪用公款。相民为了救正韩，决定出售土地。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 34
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Xiangmin collapses and passes away at the glass factory. Yingyu chases Jiaying out of the house as Jiaying reminds her of the scam that leads to Xiangmin's death. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)相民盖章把工厂卖给振道后到工厂走一圈，却因脑出血而倒毙在工厂里。英玉一看到佳英就想到美顺、载东饭馆和被骗的事，气得把佳英赶走。.

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 2
programme.desc: This travelogue brings viewers to exotic places of ultimate experience and showcase places of interest and culture. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)检查官徐正民发现死于家中,警方查出与死者最后一宗通话记录是白范,便嫌疑指向白范.姜贤阻止白范替徐正民尸检, 怕他毁灭证据.

programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Super Samayal 4 - EP 3
programme.desc: In this episode of Super Samayal, Chef Ariffin and Dhivyah Raveen teach us how to make walnut rice and oats fried fish!

programme.title: Arokiam Aarambam- Get Fit With Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 5
programme.desc: Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.title: Velunatchi - EP 55
programme.desc: Velunachi, a young village girl decides to carry her father's lineage in Tamil martial art form, Silambam.

programme.title: Sathuranga Vettai HD - EP 6
programme.desc: Sathuranga Vettai HD.

programme.title: Arokiamaagalam- Get Fit With Me - EP 1
programme.desc: Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.title: Janani D-O Madhavan - EP 0012&0013
programme.desc: Janani D-O Madhavan.

programme.title: Anjaraipetti Sr 7 - EP 19
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the foodies into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings a new flavour to their kitchen, different from the ones they are used to.

programme.title: Uravugal Sangamam - EP 70
programme.desc: The story revolves around the three families, bound by love, hate, care, jealousy and how they eventually conquer it all together.

programme.title: Lingam Stores - EP 6
programme.desc: A hilarious local sitcom featuring a community grappling with great changes to Singapore in the 1970s.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 8
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Romeo and Juliet - EP 52
programme.desc: The Vishwas are in the wedding business and the Segarens run a funeral business. Weddings and Funerals are polar opposites and so are these two families, due to past differences. As fate would have it, the inheritors of both businesses cross paths and love blossoms! Like any other Shakespearean theatre play the series embeds itself with elements of theatre, literature, romance, power, betrayal, egoism, history, comedy, tragedy and redemption!

programme.title: Ethiroli 17 - EP 2
programme.desc: Ethiroli.

programme.title: YAAR 3 - EP 31
programme.desc: Inspector Jaya and Pradeep are still trying to find out who the third meet-up was with. Sathish's autopsy reports reveal that he was poisoned with food, such as confectionary goods. The inspectors narrow down their suspicion to Nathiya, who works in a confectionary company. Did Nathiya poison Sathish?

programme.title: Kalaba Kadhala - EP 23
programme.desc: Karthik is still not back home and Nila is at her wit's end when his mother arrives home looking for Karthik.

programme.title: Maalai Maathurum - EP 36

programme.title: Nepal
programme.desc: Rob Warner and downhill pro Olly Wilkins ride around the world's tallest mountain range. Rob Warner and downhill pro Olly Wilkins ride around the world's tallest mountain range, starting at the foothills of the Himalayas in Nepal.

programme.title: The Flying Crusaders
programme.desc: The introduction of the celebratory finish-line whip manoeuvre opened the doors to a new form of motocross. In the late 1990s, the finish-line whip began as a way to show off after winning a motocross race, but this stylish trick soon opened the floodgates to a new form of self-expression which inspired a global tour – freestyle motocross.

programme.title: They see us rolling
programme.desc: Jamie and the crew go for a tow ride along the shallow river and maybe a little tow along the sand too. Jamie and the crew go for a tow ride along the shallow river, and maybe a little tow along the sand too. Then they get rolling down the hill in giant inflatable balls.

programme.title: From white water to big waves
programme.desc: Can these big wave surfers handle white water rafting over a waterfall? Jamie and the crew try white water rafting over the world's highest commercially rafted waterfall. Can these big wave surfers handle the rapids?

programme.title: Choose your instrument wisely
programme.desc: S1 E4 – The top three teams of songwriters and music producers have one more challenge before they can claim victory. S1 E4 – After creating an original track with their new partners, the top three teams of songwriters and music producers have one more challenge to face before they get a chance to land a publishing deal.

programme.title: Testing the dream
programme.desc: The time has come for 'Mad' Mike Whiddett to finally drive his drift Lamborghini for the first time. The time has come for 'Mad' Mike Whiddett to finally drive his drift Lamborghini for the first time. After so much hard work and many late nights, how well will the car drive?

programme.title: The deadline is looming
programme.desc: 'Mad' Mike Whiddett begins stripping down the Lamborghini in order to build it into a powerful ride. 'Mad' Mike Whiddett continues his mission to turn a Lamborghini into his dream car by stripping it down in order to build it into a powerful ride. The pressure is on as the deadline approaches.

programme.title: Go inside the airshow
programme.desc: The Flying Bulls take their impressive collection of aircraft to the United Kingdom for the biggest airshows. The Flying Bulls take their impressive collection of aircraft to the United Kingdom for the biggest airshows in the world. Follow behind the scenes and flanking content as the planes and pilots hit the UK.

programme.title: Douglas DC-6
programme.desc: Philipp Haidbauer shares the history of the Douglas DC-6 and all the work that went into remodelling it. Philipp Haidbauer pilots the Douglas DC-6 for the airshow in United Kingdom. He shares the history of this aircraft and all the work that went into remodelling it.

programme.title: Corsair
programme.desc: Eric Goujon pilots the Corsair, one of only 16 Corsairs still flying in the world. Eric Goujon pilots the Corsair, one of only 16 Corsairs still flying in the world, for the airshow in United Kingdom. Learn the history of this aircraft and how it needs to be flown to preserve it.

programme.title: Kawaii
programme.desc: A euphoric culture of happiness, Kawaii was born in Japan and is the backbone of the 'cute underground'. A beautiful, euphoric culture of happy escapism, Kawaii was born in Japan and is the backbone of the 'cute underground'. From fashion to music to art, anything can be Kawaii, but Kawaii is also about looking at the world with a childlike mentality.

programme.title: Frozen Titans
programme.desc: A story of Will Gadd's obsession with mixed climbing up the frozen 140 meter cave behind Helmcken Falls. Mixed climber Will Gadd looks to push the boundaries of the sport by climbing the frozen 140m cave behind Helmcken Falls. Facing freezing temps, exhaustion, and an ever-changing landscape, Will's obsession is the cutting edge of ice climbing.

programme.title: Looking for musical chemistry
programme.desc: S1 E1 – Songwriters get randomly paired up with producers as they work together to create an original track. S1 E1 – Songwriters Nic Da Kid, Lily Kiing and Piers James get randomly paired up with producers Melle Brown, TwoSeven and Tokyo the Producer in this round as they work together to create an original track.

programme.title: Pretty Sweet
programme.sub-title: A Girl and Chocolate skateboard film
programme.desc: Skateboarding's two hottest teams, Girl and Chocolate, combine forces to deliver a blockbuster skate movie. With Hollywood-level cinematography, effects and star power, Girl and Chocolate deliver a masterpiece skateboard film. Featuring Sean Malto, Guy Mariano, Marc Johnson and more, Pretty Sweet showcases fun and jaw-dropping skating in equal measure.

programme.title: Menno vs Wing
programme.desc: Ronnie catches up with Menno to talk about his 2017 Red Bull BC One World Championship battle against Wing. Ronnie catches up with Menno to take an in-depth look back at his 2017 Red Bull BC One World Final battle against Wing in his home country of the Netherlands.

programme.title: Ami vs San Andrea
programme.desc: Ronnie catches up with B-Girl Ami to take a look back at her battle in the 2018 Red Bull BC One World Final. Ronnie from the Red Bull BC One All Stars catches up with B-Girl Ami to take a look back at her battle in the the 2018 Red Bull BC One World Final in Zurich, Switzerland against San Andrea.

programme.title: Hanging Spear
programme.desc: World class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller explore the Hanging Spear Gorge. Join world class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller as they explore the Hanging Spear Gorge of the Opalescent River, the highest source of the Hudson and the deepest part of New York State’s High Peaks wilderness.

programme.title: The crevasse
programme.desc: Air Zermatt’s teamwork is put to the ultimate test when a skier falls into a 30m glacial crevasse. Air Zermatt’s teamwork is put to the ultimate test when a skier falls into the darkness of a 30m glacial crevasse. In a race against time, the team must pull him out from the depths before the ice shifts and encases him in a frozen tomb.

programme.title: The most significant race of the season?
programme.desc: Riders prepare for the prestigious Daytona SX, but a win is unlikely to prove decisive in the series battle. Only once in the past 24 years has a rider left Daytona as the AMA Supercross series leader and not won the title. But with the championship a tight four-way battle, will victory at the biggest race of the season prove to be so significant in 2019?

programme.title: A battle of team-mates
programme.desc: KTM team-mates Cooper Webb and Marvin Musquin are jostling for the top spot in an increasingly heated battle. While Honda's Ken Roczen is doing everything he can to get a win, the KTM team-mates Cooper Webb and Marvin Musquin are jostling for the top spot in an increasingly heated battle.
